meanings.definition: A hybrid animal resulting from the breeding of a coyote and a domestic dog.
meanings.sent1: The coydogs in the forest have features of both coyotes and dogs.
meanings.sent2: I saw a pack of coydogs playing near the river.
meanings.sent3: The coydogs tried to howl like coyotes but ended up barking like dogs instead.
meanings.sent4: In the twilight, the shadows of the coydogs seemed to blend into one mysterious creature.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the unique appearance of the coydogs.

meanings.sent1: The wildlife sanctuary is home to many coydogs.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the behavior of the coydogs in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The coydogs gathered around the campfire, sharing stories of their adventures.
meanings.sent4: The howls of the coydogs echoed through the valley, creating an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The tracks in the mud indicated the presence of coydogs in the area.
